definition: full of joy and expectations/animatedly
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
surname Xing
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
(of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with

sentences.english: When we excitedly to enter to the time they found themselves a fool .
sentences.chinese: 當我們興沖沖地闖進去的時候，才發現自己成了傻瓜。

sentences.english: The teacher breezed in, wearing a pair of glasses.
sentences.chinese: 老師戴着一副眼鏡興沖沖地走進來。

sentences.english: She came home excitedly only to find nobody was in.
sentences.chinese: 她興沖沖地回到家裏，卻發現一個人也沒有。

sentences.english: One evening her husband came home in high spirits.
sentences.chinese: 一天晚上她的丈夫興沖沖的回到家。

sentences.english: Often of a morning Babbitt came bouncing and jesting in to breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 巴比特往常總是興沖沖地，有說有笑地下樓喫早飯。
